page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
BILL QUAY Bill Quay and Pelaw is not a great area for industry. Some industries have been shut down or closed. Marconi's is the biggest industry in Bill Quay and the co operative wholesale Society is the biggest industry in Pelaw. Marconi Radar Systems make a lot for the armed forces like Sea Wolf torpedos and radar and guidance systems for satellites.
The Co operative Wholesale Society make paper bags, price labels and posters. We did a count on childrens fathers jobs in this area. 12.4% work in Bill Quay or Pelaw, 63.8% work locally other than Bill Quay or Pelaw, 7.9% work abroad or in other parts of the country and 15.8% do not work.
